metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14304 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description: A memory disclosure flaw was found in the Linux kernel's ethernet drivers,in the way it read data from the EEPROM of the device. This flaw allows alocal user to read uninitialized values from the kernel memory. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-10-26').
linux-kvm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
